Package restaurant

Class Restaurant

java.lang.Object
restaurant.Restaurant
public class Restaurant extends Object
Restaurant class connects different systems in the restaurant. The class itself doesn't do a lot.

      Returns:

    • makeOrder

      public void makeOrder​(int staffId, int tableId, int pax)
      Helper function for adding a new order.
      Parameters:
      staffId - The staff input id for an order
      tableId - The specific table that the order belongs to
      pax - The number of customers on this table/for this order

    • makeOrder

      public void makeOrder​(int staffId, Reservation r)
      Helper function to create a new order via corresponding reservation
      Parameters:
      staffId - the specific staff that makes the order
      r - the reservation tied to this order

    • makeReservation

      public void makeReservation​(LocalDateTime time, int tableId, int pax, long contact)
      Helper function to make a reservation
      Parameters:
      time - The customer(s) requested time
      tableId - The table to be reserved
      pax - The number of customers
      contact - The contact number of the customer(s)
